channel.title: Peanut butter jelly time
channel.description:
I was really bored so I came up with this in like 15 minutes. Enjoy lol, and if anyone has links to any tutorials which tell you how to add npc models I would be grateful if you could give them to me.
PIC: [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/ffcunr.jpg[/img]
DOWNLOAD: [url=http://www.2shared.com/file/9165209/b7eac009/1000.html]http://www.2shared.com/file/9165209/b7eac009/1000.html[/url]
INTS: (I'm no good at making ints btw) [CODE]if(i == 10125) //id { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[0] = "Use";//New option class8.anInt174 = 1000; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1500; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 364; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 1000; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 0; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = -1;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = -1;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Peanut Butter Jelly"; class8.aByteArray178 = "OMG WTF ROLF LOLZ Itz Peanutz butterz jellyz timez!!!11!!".getBytes(); }[/CODE]

item.title: Peanut butter jelly time
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“14-08, post:39, topic:314161”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=410639.msg3029726#msg3029726 date=1258285290]

Yea I’m OK at modelling(NOT) but when it comes to animating I just fail, It’s because I can’t be bothered mainly…
[/quote]This even lacks boredness.

you couldnt even let him have his moment in the spotlight?

Why would someone resist from saying something just to let someone feel good about themselves? It makes sense that ACF would say something like that. Telling someone that a horrible model looks horrible would, honestly, be better than telling them it looks great. Of course, telling him where to improve would be better than saying it is horrible, but, the only way to improve this is would be to never have made it in the first place.

How is the model horrible anyways?

It’s unique.
It has nice shape, requires a lot more skill to make this than to trace some sword and move some vertexes.

Depends what program of course… but, I’d assume your were referring to Meta, in which case I disagree. It has no shape as far as I can tell, has anyone actually put this in a server yet? Honestly, if I saw that dreadful excuse for a model sitting in front of me in an RSPS, I’d X-log hardcore and never touch it again…[/quote]

Reply #37 on: November 22, 2009
Reply #38 on: Today at 12:45:27 PM

FFFUUUUUUU-

Read full topic

Yea I’m OK at modelling(NOT) but when it comes to animating I just fail, It’s because I can’t be bothered mainly…
[/quote]This even lacks boredness.

you couldnt even let him have his moment in the spotlight?

Why would someone resist from saying something just to let someone feel good about themselves? It makes sense that ACF would say something like that. Telling someone that a horrible model looks horrible would, honestly, be better than telling them it looks great. Of course, telling him where to improve would be better than saying it is horrible, but, the only way to improve this is would be to never have made it in the first place.

How is the model horrible anyways?

It’s unique.
It has nice shape, requires a lot more skill to make this than to trace some sword and move some vertexes.[/quote]

Depends what program of course… but, I’d assume your were referring to Meta, in which case I disagree. It has no shape as far as I can tell, has anyone actually put this in a server yet? Honestly, if I saw that dreadful excuse for a model sitting in front of me in an RSPS, I’d X-log hardcore and never touch it again…

item.title: Peanut butter jelly time
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

kacper:

Thanks for all the feedback guys. I decided that I’m gonna make an attempt to do the animations but it will take ages as I will have to start learning from scratch. And please, if you dont have anything constructive to say please dont say it’s crap.

I’ve already done em.
And I can guarentee you won’t be able to, do you know what a vskin is yet?

Yeah, had to manually animate each vertex with metasequoia, then export it to rsposer and create some frames for the stand animation, and the walking animation.

Read full topic

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:14, topic:314161”][quote author=14-08 link=topic=410639.msg3029633#msg3029633 date=1258271213]

Yea I’m OK at modelling(NOT) but when it comes to animating I just fail, It’s because I can’t be bothered mainly…
[/quote]This even lacks boredness.

you couldnt even let him have his moment in the spotlight?

Why would someone resist from saying something just to let someone feel good about themselves? It makes sense that ACF would say something like that. Telling someone that a horrible model looks horrible would, honestly, be better than telling them it looks great. Of course, telling him where to improve would be better than saying it is horrible, but, the only way to improve this is would be to never have made it in the first place.

How is the model horrible anyways?

It’s unique.
It has nice shape, requires a lot more skill to make this than to trace some sword and move some vertexes.[/quote]

Maybe it does take more skill, but that doesn’t particularly mean it looks better. Anyway, my opinion, and obviously a few peoples opinion are that it looks terrible.
